text: Hai ureueng mukmin soe-soe nyang murtad Agama meuhat di jih jikeubah Di jih nyan teuma lam kawan gata Teuma cit teuka laen kaphilah Tuhan peuteuka kawom nyang laen Nyang gaseh Tuhan gopnyan Neupeugah Di ureueng nyan pih gaseh keu Tuhan Keu ureueng mukmin gopnyan meurendah Tapi ngon kaphe gopnyan kreuh that-that Laju geujihad bak jalan Allah Hana teumakot geuh keu jicaci Jikheun barangkri gopnyan jipeugah Atranyan teuma karonya Tuhan Keu soe h‘ʻeut Tuhan Neujok nyan bagah Maha luah that ‘eleumee Tuhan Dum seukalian Neuteupue sudah
